external_references.description: DHS/CISA. (2020, August 26). FASTCash 2.0: North Korea's BeagleBoyz Robbing Banks. Retrieved September 29, 2021.

description: [APT38](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0082) has used Task Scheduler to run programs at system startup or on a scheduled basis for persistence.(Citation: CISA AA20-239A BeagleBoyz August 2020)
